thread.title: AIADMK: OPS vs Sasikala: Statements taken from 119 AIADMK MLAs, Tamil Nadu govt informs Madras HC
thread.title_full: AIADMK: OPS vs Sasikala: Statements taken from 119 AIADMK MLAs, Tamil Nadu govt informs Madras HC

author: A Subramani
title: AIADMK: OPS vs Sasikala: Statements taken from 119 AIADMK MLAs, Tamil Nadu govt informs Madras HC
text:
CHENNAI: The Tamil Nadu government of Monday informed the Madras high court that police and revenue officials had taken statements of 119 AIADMK legislators staying at resort near Mahabalipuram.
The statements were taken from the MLAs on Saturday as directed by the court that is hearing two habeas corpus petitions to trace 'missing' MLAs.
The MLAs are staying in Golden Beach Resort at Koovathur apparently in support of AIADMK general secretary V K Sasikala who has staked claim to form government after chief minister O Panneerselvam revolted against her.
The court reserved its order after hearing arguments.
